subject: Football
Concussions
lead_paragraph: The Jets will be without the star cornerback Darrelle Revis, who sustained a concussion on Nov. 22 at Houston, when they take on the Giants and Beckham.
snippet: The Jets will be without the star cornerback Darrelle Revis, who sustained a concussion on Nov. 22 at Houston, when they take on the Giants and Beckham.
